channel.title: Bernard Madoff gets 150 years
channel.description:
http://news.yahoo.com/s/ap/20090629/ap_on_bi_ge/us_madoff_scandal
NEW YORK – Convicted swindler Bernard Madoff was sentenced to 150 years in prison Monday for fraud so extensive that the judge said he needed to send a symbolic message to those who might imitate his fraud and to victims who need relief. Applause broke out in the crowded Manhattan courtroom after U.S. District Judge Denny Chin issued the maximum sentence to the 71-year-old defendant, who said he sought no forgiveness and knew he must live "with this pain, this torment, for the rest of my life." Chin rejected a request by Madoff's lawyer for leniency and said he disagreed that victims of the fraud were seeking mob vengeance. "Here the message must be sent that Mr. Madoff's crimes were extraordinarily evil and that this kind of manipulation of the system is not just a bloodless crime that takes place on paper, but one instead that takes a staggering toll," Chin said. The judge said the estimate that Madoff has cost his victims more than $13 billion was conservative because it did not include money from feeder funds.
150 years. I lol'd

item.title: Bernard Madoff gets 150 years
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:20, topic:286054”][quote author=sppt link=topic=378349.msg2848239#msg2848239 date=1246396559]

jack the ripper is probably the most famous criminal in english history and you actually learn about him at school, criminals are as important to history as the leaders of the time. Think of WW2, there’s Hitler (who the allied forces saw to be the criminal) and there’s churchill (who the germans saw to be the criminal) both figures are impoortant in both histories

If you think Hitler was a good person then you’re an idiot. I’m not calling you an idiot though. I’m stating an opinion, and if you kill almost a whole race, then you have no heart. Human beings were not made for destruction…

Uhh… without Hitler we would still be cycling/driving very slow cars
[/quote]
Yeah WWII helped us out alot…[/quote]
More than most people think.

Read full topic

item.description:

I don’t even know who this guy is lmao.

quit being lazy and google him

Doesn’t sound like he’s very important, so I’m not gonna waste my time… Also, YouTube’s also very good with information…

Not very important? He committed what may be the largest investment fraud in Wall Street history… and if by “very good” you mean often full of bias and false information, then yes.

Just sounds like a criminal to me… What good is that in the world?
[/quote]
Yes, a criminal, but part of history, and history is very important and should be remembered and learned from.[/quote]
We have not learned from the other ponzifrauds, why would we learn now?
